nodes.text: Solo: A Star Wars Story: The Official Movie Companion
Solo: A Star Wars Story: The Official Movie Companion is a standalone issue of Star Wars Insider and focuses on Solo: A Star Wars Story. It is released on September 25, 2018 by Titan Magazines.
A deep dive into the story of Han Solo's early years, Solo: A Star Wars Story. Including interviews, images and behind-the-scenes commentary, collected together in this deluxe collector's edition.
